statements: SELECT * FROM AviationCompliance;
SELECT documentation, flight_records FROM AviationCompliance;
SELECT * FROM AviationCompliance WHERE compliance_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT documentation FROM AviationCompliance WHERE documentation LIKE '%safety%';
SELECT * FROM AviationCompliance ORDER BY compliance_id DESC;
SELECT documentation, flight_records FROM AviationCompliance WHERE compliance_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM AviationCompliance WHERE documentation LIKE '%compliance%'
SELECT documentation FROM AviationCompliance WHERE compliance_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001')
SELECT flight_records FROM AviationCompliance WHERE documentation IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM AviationCompliance ORDER BY compliance_id ASC
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT document_type, document_name FROM documentation WHERE document_id = 5;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM documentation ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM documentation WHERE document_type = 'Report';
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM documentation WHERE document_name LIKE 'Invoices%';
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE document_type = 'Manual';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documentation WHERE document_id > 100 ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type, LENGTH(document_content) AS content_length FROM documentation WHERE document_type LIKE '%spec%' ORDER BY content_length DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM documentation WHERE document_name LIKE 'User%' AND LENGTH(document_content) > 500;
SELECT flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flight_records WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_date ASC;
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM documentation;
SELECT flight_id, aircraft_id, pilot_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_records ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_description, rule_category FROM regulations WHERE rule_category = 'Safety';
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE document_type = 'Manual';
SELECT rule_id, rule_name FROM regulations WHERE rule_category = 'Compliance' ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE document_type='manual' ORDER BY document_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM documentation WHERE document_link IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(document_name) > 10;
SELECT flight_id, aircraft_id, pilot_id, departure_time FROM flight_records WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND arrival_time < '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT rule_name, rule_category FROM regulations WHERE rule_description LIKE '%safety%' ORDER BY rule_name;
SELECT * FROM documentation JOIN flight_records ON documentation.document_id = flight_records.flight_id WHERE flight_records.departure_time < '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT doc_id, doc_name, upload_date FROM documentation WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT flight_id, pilot_name, aircraft_type FROM flight_records WHERE flight_id = 10;
SELECT reg_name, reg_description FROM regulations WHERE reg_name LIKE 'Air%';
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM documentation ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT flight_id, pilot_name, aircraft_type FROM flight_records WHERE flight_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT doc_name, uploaded_by FROM documentation WHERE doc_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE doc_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT reg_id, reg_name FROM regulations ORDER BY reg_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Mandatory';
SELECT crew_name, crew_role FROM FlightCrew ORDER BY crew_name ASC;
SELECT aircraft_model, manufacturer, production_year FROM Aircraft WHERE production_year > 2010 ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT flight_id, flight_date, pilot_name, aircraft_type, departure_location, arrival_location FROM FlightRecords ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Safety'
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_content FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE document_id > 100
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE document_title LIKE '%Regulation%'
SELECT * FROM FlightRecords WHERE flight_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY flight_date DESC
SELECT flight_id, pilot_name, aircraft_type FROM FlightRecords INNER JOIN FlightCrew ON FlightRecords.pilot_name = FlightCrew.crew_name
